alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and southwestern Simpson Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Portland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Logan and southwestern Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Black Jack, Neosheo, Dot, Geddes, Lickskillet, Schley, Adairville, Keysburg, Schochoh and Schweizer. TIME...MOT...LOC 1834Z 273DEG 151KT 3668 8664 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
